name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and then drain the rest.
In a large skillet, cook the pancetta or bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
In the same skillet, saut√© the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
Return the spaghetti to the skillet with the garlic, then add the pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, garnished with additional Parmesan and parsley.
